os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Linux

name: Nixcel
short_description: Nixcel is an alternative operating system to Microsoft Windows™ or Apple Mac OSX™, based on the Linux kernel, aimed at novice Linux users. It comes pre-packed with plenty of software to use (which can be easily changed to suit your needs), includes the MATE window manager (a fork of the abandoned GNOME2) and works on nearly any computer you throw it at. The Nixcel operating system is 100% free of cost for you to enjoy and share.
summary: A Easy-To-Use Linux Distro aimed at Novice Linux Users.
